sentences.sContent: I am with Japan on this one.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am with Japan on this one.
sentences.sCn: 在这件事情上我支持日本。

sentences.sContent: We all pray for the victims of Japan.
sentences.sContent_eng: We all pray for the victims of Japan.
sentences.sCn: 我们都在为日本的受害者祈祷。

sentences.sContent: What should I do to send this to Japan?
sentences.sContent_eng: What should I do to send this to Japan?
sentences.sCn: 把这个送回日本我需要做些什么？
